name: Zombies Shoot Target
description:
Challenge is to defeat zombies in destruction and the horror they are causing. Fire a hail of bullets to kill all the beasts to stop them from killing humans

GAME FEATURES
- Intense zombies shooting action.
- Kill different zombies.
- Enjoy the sensation of firing and killing the evil.
- Cool high fidelity 3D graphics.
- Immersive game play.
